abstract: A group that includes Silver Lake and DST Global is offering to buy privately owned shares in Alibaba, valuing the Chinese e-commerce giant at more than $32 billion.
snippet: A group that includes Silver Lake and DST Global is offering to buy privately owned shares in Alibaba, valuing the Chinese e-commerce giant at more than $32 billion.
lead_paragraph: An investment group that includes Silver Lake Partners and DST Global said Thursday that it would begin a $1.6 billion tender offer for shares in the Alibaba Group, the Chinese e-commerce giant.

headline.main: Silver Lake and DST Begin Tender Offer for Alibaba Shares
